attributes.title: Eli dont liee
attributes.review: Okay so first it took 4 years for this app to download, I maybe a fish dog hybrid but I’m pretty sure that’s not normal. I downloaded this with the intentions of attending every trump rally and watching all of sir Oranges live events. We need to do better if were gonna make America great again. This app is stuck on his face #votedTrump2020

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: Ok I seriously thought this was gonna be a good app, but my god it’s bad. Sooo bad. It took such a long time to download and it wasn’t good. For starters the app is super bad quality. Thought it was going to be a good app, but it’s not 😔 don’t download it. Save yourself from wasting your time. Please. It’s not worth your time to download this app.

attributes.title: Creepy glitches
attributes.review: Ever since I got this app my phone has been glitching but not only my phone the things around it, whenever the app will glitch the tv and lights will start glitching and the lights will be turning off and on like if one of the wires has been messed up

attributes.title: not worth your time
attributes.review:
hi, i am a fellow trump supporter and was beyond excited to download this app and support our amazing president however i want satisfied at all.  for one the app is very slow. i waited way to long for it to load but i was patient bc trump is just so great. once it did finally load the whole set up was messy and too confusing to understand. but it was made by a man so who's shocked. the whole thing is just news that we hear from the tv anyways so what's the point of downloading this stupid app. 

oh yeah and i hate trump 😘

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!And once I downloaded the app I kept on getting spam calls and then all of a sudden my phone got shut down so I had to take it to Apple and they said that this app is connected to a virus that takes all your information and sells it to the dark web. Terrible.

attributes.title: what is deleting TikTok going to do???
attributes.review: Hi I am a full trump supporter all the way!! but all this "Banning TikTok" business is out of hand. Do you know how many Chinese app their r taking the same info? What r you going to do ban ALLL Chinese apps? Think about all of the jobs he will be taking away from young creators. Jut FYI gen z won't go out without a fight🧚✨🌟💗🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Ignorant
attributes.review: This app discriminated against me and tried to get me deported. i cant BELIEVE THIS. I was just trying to support our "president" and this app was horrid towards me. I feel betrayed and i hope this app is taken down. If i could give it zero stars I would. I will never recover and will have horrible PTSD. I hate this app. Take it down.

attributes.title: ‼️Worst app to date on the App Store ‼️
attributes.review: I am genuinely shocked at how an app developer let this app even be published to a public App Store. It runs slow, tons of ads and not to mention whoever this orange guy is is absolutely awful on the eyes ‼️‼️ do not, I repeat do not download this app when there is oompaloompa porn on the Internet ‼️

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: I joined the app TikTok as a joke but if TikTok gets taken down you will crush the hearts of so many people including me. You might think “oh, it’s just a stupid app.. people can just find a different one” but TikTok isn’t an app it’s one big family. Please don’t take our family away from us Mr. Trump. I’m begging you :(

attributes.title: Don’t do it
attributes.review: My perfect 2020 vision... gone...the second I opened the app I saw an orange atrocity that made my eyes burn, first thing he said was that Mexicans don’t belong here and the usual bs that comes out of its mouth...very very disappointed... also black lives matter, Mexican lives matter, you can’t stop us all you Cheeto!!
